message: I'm feeling generous this round, Bob.  Take it or leave it!
Alice, my turn! Let's be reasonable. This offer still gives you a significant portion.
Bob, let's make a deal. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my while.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at my share even more!
Bob, this is my final offer.  Inflation is hurting both of us, but I'm willing to split it more fairly than your last offer.
